isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - TROUBLESHOOTING - TESTING THE M-21 MODULATOR

svcprocinfo.para: Perform INSPECTION FOR ILLUMINATED LEDS before performing this test!
This test should be performed after the LEDS tests and the the following three conditions are present:

item.para: A FRT or RER Red LED is illuminated
A RHT or LFT Red LED is illuminated
The MOD Red LED is illuminated

svcprocinfo.para: The following tests provide flow charts for testing the four M-21 modulators and their connecting circuits to the controller.

figure.caption: Figure 22. Diagnostic Display
